content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a great living space. As we discuss the rental price, I'm open to hearing your thoughts and proposals. How much were you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is unfurnished and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be around 750 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I must decline that offer. The location of the apartment, being in the city center with close proximity to all amenities, justifies a higher price. I'm looking to rent it out for at least 850 euros per month. Would you be willing to negotiate towards that number?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point, and I understand the value of the location. However, I'm a student and I have to consider my budget. I'm willing to go up to 800 euros per month. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your budget is understandable, but as a landlord, I have to consider the market value and the investment I've made in the apartment. I'm willing to negotiate a bit more, but I'm not sure if 800 euros is going to be acceptable. How about we meet in the middle at 825 euros per month? This is still lower than my initial offer and reflects the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for meeting me halfway. I agree to the price of 825 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 825 euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
